post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Hi ,
Trust all is well with you. My apologies for not personalizing this email as I am sending this email to thousands of people in my network and I thank you for any assistance you can give me. Please see below the details on some roles that I am currently pursuing for my client. Regards, Ed.
Front-End Developer - Contract work - month to month - Downtown Toronto - $30-35 per hour - CSS, HTML, Must have built a program that lives as an application on Facebook,MySpace or some social network. Immediate start date!
Ed Rix Global Search Consultant Watercrest "Bridging People with Technology" '(888) 244-7550 ext.110 š ed@watercrest.net
post.title: Front-End Developer - Contract work
